main event: A report details a UFO sighting involving two erratic star-like objects observed on 31 Aug 52 in Tularosa, New Mexico.
interesting points: The objects were described as having a bright star color and shape,Objects were seen immediately after a scheduled balloon release,One object appeared to be stationary while the other continued moving quickly,The sighting included a family driving towards Alamogordo,The duration of visibility of the last object was notably short as it disappeared behind a mountain.
witness description: a family driving from Cloudcraft to Alamogordo
